rationale: Full page reloads are jarring, slow, and cause unnecessary network requests. A proper state reset provides instant feedback and maintains the user's mental context of where they are in the app.
problemSolved: In IncidentList.tsx lines 65-68, handleResetFilters() calls window.location.reload(). The comment even acknowledges 'This would need to be passed from parent'. The empty state at lines 70-94 could use a reset button that's currently missing.
